mapper.select: SELECT A.PROJECT_ID AS projectId, A.PROJECT_NAME AS projectName, B.USER_NAME AS userName, A.EVA_START_DT AS evaStartDt, A.EVA_END_DT AS evaEndDt, C.CODE_NAME AS codeName, A.EVA_CD AS evaCd, A.SCORE_FIN AS scoreFin, A.DEL_YN AS delYn, A.FRST_RGSR_ID AS firstRgsrId, A.FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM AS frstRgsrDtlDttm, A.LAST_CHNG_ID AS lastChngId, A.LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM AS lastChngDtlDttm, A.USER_GROUP_ID AS userGroupId, A.EVA_GROUP_ID AS evaGroupId, A.PROJECT_DETAIL AS projectDetail, A.URL AS url FROM SCH_INCU.PROJECT A LEFT JOIN SCH_INCU.USER B ON A.LAST_CHNG_ID = B.USER_EMAIL LEFT JOIN SCH_INCU.CODE C ON A.EVA_CD = C.CODE_VAL AND C.UPPER_CODE_NAME = 'EVALUATION' WHERE A.LAST_CHNG_ID = #{userEmail} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM DESC

AND A.PROJECT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchProjectName}, '%')
AND DATE(A.EVA_START_DT) >= CAST(#{searchStartDate} AS DATE)

ORDER BY A.FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM DESC

SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(PROJECT_ID, 4) AS PRO_NUM)) IS NULL THEN 'PRJO0001' ELSE CONCAT('PRJ', LPAD(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(PROJECT_ID, 4) AS INTEGER)) + 1 AS VARCHAR, 4, '0')) END FROM SCH_INCU.PROJECT WHERE PROJECT_ID LIKE 'PRJ%'
INSERT INTO SCH_INCU.PROJECT (PROJECT_ID, PROJECT_NAME, EVA_CD, SCORE_FIN, PROJECT_DETAIL, URL, EVA_START_DT, EVA_END_DT, DEL_YN, FRST_RGSR_ID, FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM, LAST_CHNG_ID, LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM) VALUES (#{projectId}, #{projectName}, 'A', NULL, NOW(), NULL, #{userGroupId}, NULL, #{projectDetail}, #{url}, 'N', #{userEmail}, NOW(), #{userEmail}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE SCH_INCU.PROJECT SET PROJECT_NAME = #{projectName}, PROJECT_DETAIL = #{projectDetail}, URL = #{url}, LAST_CHNG_ID = #{userEmail}, LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM = NOW() WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND LAST_CHNG_ID = #{userEmail} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
UPDATE SCH_INCU.PROJECT SET DEL_YN = 'Y', LAST_CHNG_ID = #{userEmail}, LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM = NOW() WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND LAST_CHNG_ID = #{userEmail} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
